name: They're Trying to Ram Us VR
name_original: They're Trying to Ram Us VR
description:
• Fight hordes of increasingly aggressive rammers. All out to get you!
  • Features an innovative control scheme: Steer your ship with your head. Use the controller to move your ship.
  • Build up your combo meter and laser the rammers to oblivion.
  • Survive as long as you can!
  • Requires an Oculus Rift DK2 or CV1 and an Xbox 360 or Xbox One controller
